file_sizes.name: file_sizes
file_sizes.label: Max. File Size
file_sizes.description: If you need to increase max upload size please contact your hosting.

file_types.name: file_types
file_types.label: Allowed File Types
file_types.description: Enter the allowed file types, separated by a comma (jpg, gif, pdf, etc).

field_options.label: Options
field_options.description: Enter each option in a separate line. To differentiate between label and value, separate them with a pipe char ("|"). For example: First Name|f_name
field_options.name: field_options

recaptcha_badge.label: Badge
recaptcha_badge.description: To view the validation badge, switch to preview mode
recaptcha_badge.name: recaptcha_badge

css_classes.label: CSS Classes
css_classes.title: Add your custom class WITHOUT the dot. e.g: my-class
css_classes.name: css_classes

custom_id.label: ID
custom_id.description: Please make sure the ID is unique and not used elsewhere in this form. This field allows A-z 0-9 & underscore chars without spaces.
custom_id.name: custom_id

button_css_id.label: Button ID
button_css_id.title: Add your custom id WITHOUT the Pound key. e.g: my-id
button_css_id.description: Please make sure the ID is unique and not used elsewhere on the page this form is displayed. This field allows A-z 0-9 & underscore chars without spaces.
button_css_id.name: button_css_id

submit_actions.label: Add Action
submit_actions.description: Add actions that will be performed after a visitor submits the form (e.g. send an email notification). Choosing an action will add its setting below.
submit_actions.name: submit_actions

email_content.label: Message
email_content.description: By default, all form fields are sent via [all-fields] shortcode. To customize sent fields, copy the shortcode that appears inside each field and paste it above.
email_content.name: email_content

email_content_2.label: Message
email_content_2.description: By default, all form fields are sent via [all-fields] shortcode. To customize sent fields, copy the shortcode that appears inside each field and paste it above.
email_content_2.name: email_content_2

webhooks.label: Webhook URL
webhooks.description: Enter the integration URL (like Zapier) that will receive the form's submitted data.
webhooks.name: webhooks

mailchimp_api_key_msg.raw: Set your MailChimp API Key in the Integrations Settings. You can also set a different MailChimp API Key by choosing "Custom".
mailchimp_api_key_msg.name: mailchimp_api_key_msg

mailchimp_api_key.label: Custom API Key
mailchimp_api_key.description: Use this field to set a custom API Key for the current form

_background_attachment_alert.raw: Note: Attachment Fixed works only on desktop.
_background_attachment_alert.name: _background_attachment_alert

_background_video_link.label: Video Link
_background_video_link.description: YouTube/Vimeo link, or link to video file (mp4 is recommended).
_background_video_link.name: _background_video_link

_background_video_fallback.label: Background Fallback
_background_video_fallback.description: This cover image will replace the background video in case that the video could not be loaded.

_background_hover_attachment_alert.raw: Note: Attachment Fixed works only on desktop.
_background_hover_attachment_alert.name: _background_hover_attachment_alert

_position_description.raw: Please note! Custom positioning is not considered best practice for responsive web design and should not be used too frequently.
_position_description.name: _position_description

responsive_description.raw: Responsive visibility will take effect only on preview or live page, and not while editing in Elementor.
responsive_description.name: responsive_description

_attributes.label: Custom Attributes
_attributes.description: Set custom attributes for the wrapper element. Each attribute in a separate line. Separate attribute key from the value using | character.
_attributes.name: _attributes

custom_css_title.raw: Add your own custom CSS here
custom_css_title.name: custom_css_title

custom_css_description.raw:
Use "selector" to target wrapper element. Examples:
selector {color: red;} // For main element
selector .child-element {margin: 10px;} // For child element
.my-class {text-align: center;} // Or use any custom selector
custom_css_description.name: custom_css_description
